title: Investing in Climate Change and Clean Energy Solutions (US Department of State)
text: ( Source : US Department of State ) Now is a critical time for climate change response. In December, world leaders will convene at the UN Climate Conference in Paris to reach a comprehensive agreement to address and work towards eliminating
